The provided code chunk is part of the __init__ method in the BufferedDistancePhasedNode class, which initializes distance parameters by extracting base distances from a buffer parameter map before calling the parent class's initializer.

sParams = dict(bufferParamMap)
        for key in sParams:
            sParams[key] = sParams[key][0]

        DistancePhasedNode.__init__(self, name = name,
                                    phaseParamMap = sParams,
                                    autoCleanup = autoCleanup,
                                    enterPrefix = enterPrefix,
                                    exitPrefix = exitPrefix,
                                    phaseCollideMask = phaseCollideMask,
                                    fromCollideNode = fromCollideNode)
